thread.section_title: Gamesdeal.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamesdeal.com | www.gamesdeal.com
thread.title: Dennis

author: Dennis
title: Dennis
text:
These guys know what good service are. They keep you informed all the way in a very detailed, but still in a short and understandable way.
The website is indeed a pleasure to look at as you easily can find what you are looking for, and if you choose to log in (I'll recommend it) then you get points/what I would call a little money back for each thing you buy.
Now to the prices, they may have good service, they may have a neat point system on thier site, but thier prices is a about 2-4 $ over the cheapest seller (depends on the game you are going to buy as they sometimes are the cheapest) which doesn't equals thier point system as 0,63 $, simple doesn't give 2-4 $.
This is why they get 4/5.
